Dialogue.Page: A spherical body levitates above the sun, opposite my station.
An entrance hatch is left open, but my scans are unable to penetrate the interior.
A spherical body levitates above the sun, opposite my station.
An entrance hatch is left open, but my scans are unable to penetrate the interior.
My Hearthian friend tells me this space station contains a device capable of ascending the user to a higher plane!
While I was unable to ascend, I did however find some interesting artifacts which I have appropriated for my own collection.
The disco ball in particular will be quite the show-stopper at my clan's Festival, I believe.
